org.graphstream.ui.geom
Class Box3

java.lang.Object
  org.graphstream.ui.geom.Box3
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Locator
public class Box3
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable

3D box. A Box3 is a rectangular parallelepiped characterized by two 3D points.

Since:
19990829
Version:
0.1
Author:
Antoine Dutot
See Also:
Serialized Form

unionOf

public void unionOf(Box3 a,
                    Box3 b)
             throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
Set geometry as the union of a and b. This always works, even if a and b have no common part. Neither a nor b are modified.

Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException

unionWith

public void unionWith(Box3 other)
               throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
Set geometry as the union of this and other. other is not modified.

Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException

intersectionOf

public void intersectionOf(Box3 a,
                           Box3 b)
                    throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
Set geometry as the intersection of a and b. If this intersection is empty, one or all components of lo will be greater than the corresponding components of hi. Neither a nor b are modified.

Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException

intersectionWith

public void intersectionWith(Box3 other)
                      throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
Set geometry as the intersection of this and other. If this intersection is empty, one or all components of lo will be greater than the corresponding components of hi. other is not modified.

Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException

moveTo

public void moveTo(float x,
                   float y,
                   float z)
Move lo to the absolute location (x,y,z). The point hi is moved from the same amount than lo.

move

public void move(float dx,
                 float dy,
                 float dz)
Move the two points along the (dx,dy,dz) vector.

public java.lang.String tostring()
